WRITING.TITLE: Whose Line's 11th Season - To not be cut by 4 episodes
WRITING.TEXT:
I think the words "Fall Season finale" all threw us off; It also threw me off; So upon looking up "Fall Season finale", I found the definition as: "to denote a series whose current season has been split into two halves in order to make room for a mid-season replacement series"
Which most likely means we'll see the last four episodes around the Nov-Jan time frame. Also CW's Press site does not note tonight's episode as the Season finale; nor are any of Whose Line's social media platforms referring to it as such either! So all of that seems to signify that tonight's episode (10/5/15 at 9P) will not be the Season Finale.
Whose Line's Season has not been cut by four episodes.
I know, they're working on licensing for several other episodes as well.
The ep is not on there yet
Big Mean Carl!
Best: Either Director, Cheese, Bald II, or Lawyer (Worst: The Bad Breath and Smelly Feet Hoedown
Honestly wish I knew!
Producers/Editors

Actually Hoedown/IDS are done as much as Doo Wop at the tapings; It's just whatever is chosen to air. (Like for an Example; There were 5 Hoedowns at the Tapings this season, only one aired thus far; and a majority of the Hoedowns at the tapings were done twice too!)
NOW I get what 11:(Insert number here) in your titles! (Longest time I was questioning "Why on earth is he putting a time in the title?!".. Glad my brain started working!)

WRITING.TITLE: Changes for Next Season?
WRITING.TEXT:
With the Season having just nine more episodes left, I thought now would be a good time for all of us to chime in on the changes we'd like to see happen for the next season.
(Changes being like; Bringing back certain games, getting rid of the guests, having certain guests, changes on the way the show's edited (Like certain game line ups), More or Less of a game; All of that nature)
*This will not be used to insult anyone on the show, Please be courteous. Have Fun and Discuss!
